titleStmt.title: Pirāṉmalai, X temple, time of X, year X

handDesc.p: No distinction between e and ē, nor between o and ō.

projectDesc.p: The project DHARMA has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

prefixDef.p: Public URIs with the prefix bib to point to a Zotero Group Library named ERC-DHARMA whose data are open to the public.
Internal URIs using the part prefix to point to person elements in the DHARMA_IdListMembers_v01.xml file.

revisionDesc.change: Creation of the file on the repository

div.p:
kō-c-caṭaiya-paṉmar-āṉa tri-bhuvaṉa-c-cakkara-varttikaḷ śrī-vīra-pāṇṭiya-tēvarkku yāṇṭu mū
ṉṟ-āvatu kaṉṉa-nāyaṟṟu pūrva-pakṣattu saptamiyum tiṅkaṭ-kiḻamaiyum peṟṟa Aṉiḻattu nāḷ
tiru-malai-nāṭṭu tiru-k-koṭuṅ-kuṉṟattu Uṭaiyār tiru-k-koṭuṅ-kuṉṟam-uṭaiya nāyaṉār
kōyiṟ-tēvakaṉma-śrī-mākēcura-kaṇkāṇi cī-kāriyañ ceyvārkaḷ kōyiṟ-kaṇa
kkarōm kēraḷa-ciṅka-vaḷanāṭṭu Aḷakāpuri-y-āṉa ceḻiya-nārāyaṇa-purattu maṇaṟkkuṭai
yāṉ poṟ-patikku nāyakaṉ tiru-v-ampala-p-perumāḷ-āṉa peruñvcatira-kupērar tiru-malai mē
l Ivar Eḻunt-aruḷivitta nāyaṉār tiru-v-ampala-p-perumāḷukku tiru-p-paṭimāṟṟukkum tiru-mañ
caṉam tiru-vi(ḷa)kku cāttu-p-paṭi pūccu-p paṭi Uḷḷiṭṭa viñcaṉaṅkaḷ Uṭaiyār tiru-k-koṭuṅ-kuṉ
ṟam-uṭaiya nāyaṉār cī-paṇṭārattilē Āvaṇi-mātam 5-ñcān tiyati mutal vaḷaiyiṟ kā
lāl nāḷ oṉṟukku nā-ṉāḻi Ariciyum kaṟi-yamut' uḷḷiṭṭa viñcaṉamum paṇṭārattē ce
luttuvat' āka Uṭaiyār tiru-k-koṭuṅ-kuṉṟam-uṭaiya nāyaṉārkku-t tiru-p-paṭi māṟṟukku nel
koḷḷa y-i-p-peruñ catirar kupērar pakkal vāṅkiṉa cōḻiya naṟ paḻaṅ kācu 7 10

Ip-paḻaṅ k
ācu Eḻupatum mutal nīkki kai-k-koṇṭu (palakai)-t talaiyilē Ariciyum viñcaṉaṅ kaḷu
m celuttuvat' āka Ip-paṭi kalveṭṭi-k kuṭuttōm tēvakaṉmi cī-mākēcura-kaṇkāṇi
ceyvār cī-kāriyañ ceyvār kōyil-k-kaṇakkarōm
Ariḷi-c ceyal paṭi vināyaka-tēvar Eḻu
ttu
Ip-paṭikku paḻaṅ kācu Eḻupatukkum tēva-kaṉmi cuppiramaṇṇiya-paṭṭa-tirunāvaṟkk-ara
cu nāṟ-patt-eṇṇ-āyira-paṭṭaṉ Eḻuttu
p-paṭikku tiru-malai-Uṭaiyāṉ tiru-k-kai-vēl
Aḻakiya Eḻuttu
Ivai kōyil-kaṇakku tiru-c-ciṟṟ-ampalam-u⌈
ṭaiyāṉ Eḻut
This edition by G. Vijayavenugopal (2022). Reviewed by Emmanuel Francis (2024), based on photos (N. Ramaswamy).
